Public Interface IMultipleResults Implements IDisposable, IFunctionResult
type IMultipleResults = interface interface IFunctionResult interface IDisposable
public interface class IMultipleResults : IDisposable, System::Data::Linq::IFunctionResult

Docs.summary: Represents the results of mapped functions or queries with variable return sequences.

remarks.format:
## Remarks In the following SQL code example, the result shape depends on the input (`shape =1` or `shape = 2`). The order that the projections are returned is undefined.
## Examples
``` CREATE PROCEDURE VariableResultShapes(@shape int) AS if(@shape = 1) select CustomerID, ContactTitle, CompanyName from customers else if(@shape = 2) select OrderID, ShipName from orders ```

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<!!TElement> GetResult<TElement>() cil managed
Public Function GetResult(Of TElement) () As IEnumerable(Of TElement)

Docs.typeparam: The type of the sequence to be returned.
Docs.summary: Retrieves the next result as a sequence of a specified type.
Docs.returns: An enumeration for iterating over the results.

remarks.format:
## Remarks You would use code similar to the following to execute this stored procedure.
> [!NOTE] > You must use the <xref:System.Data.Linq.IMultipleResults.GetResult%2A> pattern to obtain an enumerator of the correct type, based on your knowledge of the stored procedure.
